title: Bottlenose dolphins (Tursiops truncatus) display gaze alternation and referential communication in an impossible task
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Ying Zeng, Luigi Baciadonna, James R. Davies, Cristina Pilenga, Livio Favaro, Elias Garcia-Pelegrin
